text: Arau munaphikasakalaka prakasa karaara babe; arau sihamtaka koraa haichila, ‘aha, tomaloke allahara pathata yud'dha karaa athaba pratiraodha karaa’. Sihamte kaichila, ‘yadi yud'dha ha’ba buli janilohemtena tente ami tomalokara anusarana karailohemtena’. Se'idina sihamta imanatakai kupharaira bechi ocarata achila. Sihamte mukherae yibora kaya acalate seya sihamtara antarata na'i arau sihamte yibora gopana karai raakhe seya allaha adhika aragata
